text:
@AOC What? @AOC thinks POC aren’t “able” to stay inside & practice social distancing? Why?

How does suspected “redlining” spread #Coronavirus?

How does “environmental racism” spread this virus?

Saying non-whites don’t know how to deal with this pandemic... THAT sounds racist.
